basics.name: Vignesh
basics.summary: I believe there are 2 types of people, one who believe that the future can't be seen, others who are building it, I fall in the latter category because I am too restless to sit and wait for things to happen, I am someone who likes to catalyze the events to reach the future faster, previously I was working on my own startup in the education and learning space, had 800k+ users as on 31/12/2020.

publications.name: Interview with Anish Kumar Rathee, Founder of Learnr
publications.summary: I was invited by most popular stories, an online Magzine, as a Founder of Learnr.ai for an interview with Most Popular Stories to know about my entrepreneurial journey.
